scanner.errorMessage: Failed to check product eligibility. Please try again.
scanner.pluModalSubtitle: Enter the PLU — the 4-5 digit number on the produce sticker
scanner.pluInvalidFormat: Please enter a 4 or 5 digit PLU code

result.freshProduceNote: Fresh fruits and vegetables are covered by your Cash Value Benefit (CVB).
result.selectParticipantMessage: Please select a participant to add this item to cart.
result.addedToCartMessage: {{product}} has been added to your cart.
result.notApprovedExplanation: This product may not be on Michigan's WIC Approved Product List (APL). Check the product size, brand, or category - even small differences can affect eligibility.
result.noReports: No recent reports. Be the first to report where you found this product!
result.reportSuccess: Your sighting has been reported and will help other WIC participants.

benefits.title: My Benefits
benefits.failedToLoad: Failed to load benefits. Please check your connection.
benefits.noBenefitsMessage: Set up your household and benefits to get started
benefits.notice: Benefits shown are for the current period. Unused benefits do not roll over to the next month.

cart.title: Shopping Cart
cart.failedToLoad: Failed to load cart. Please check your connection.
cart.emptyCartSubtitle: Scan products to add them to your cart
cart.emptyCartMessage: Your cart is empty. Add items to checkout.

formula.title: Formula Finder
formula.subtitle: Find infant formula at nearby stores
formula.selectFormula: Tap to select your assigned formula
formula.noStoresMessage: No stores found within {{radius}} miles that carry this formula.
formula.foundFormulaHelp: Found formula? Help others by reporting it!
formula.advancedSearchDesc: Search by brand, type, or name across all stores
formula.aboutText: Results combine store availability data with community reports. Stores shown "usually" or "always" carry this formula type, while confirmed reports show actual recent availability.
formula.callAhead: Always call ahead to verify before traveling.
formula.locationRequiredMsg: Please enable location services to search for nearby stores.
formula.selectFormulaAlertMsg: Please select your assigned formula first.
formula.searchFailedMsg: Unable to search for formula. Please try again.
formula.locationDenied: Location permission denied. Enable location to find nearby stores.
formula.locationFailed: Could not get your location. Please try again.

crossStoreSearch.title: Find Formula
crossStoreSearch.subtitle: Search across multiple stores
crossStoreSearch.searchByName: Search by name, brand, or UPC...
crossStoreSearch.noStoresFound: No stores found. Try a wider search radius or different search terms.
crossStoreSearch.noStoresInStock: No stores with recent in-stock reports found. Try expanding your search.
crossStoreSearch.initialText: Search by brand, type, or name to find stores that have your formula in stock.
crossStoreSearch.locationRequiredMessage: Please enable location services to search for stores.
crossStoreSearch.searchRequiredMessage: Please enter a search term, select a brand, or choose a formula type.
crossStoreSearch.searchFailedMessage: Unable to search for formula. Please try again.
crossStoreSearch.locationError: Location permission required to search nearby stores.
crossStoreSearch.locationErrorRetry: Could not get your location. Please try again.

alternatives.noAlternatives: No alternative formulas found for this product.
alternatives.disclaimerText: Always consult your baby's pediatrician before switching formulas. These are suggestions based on type and availability, not medical advice.
alternatives.footerNote: Alternatives are sorted by compatibility and availability. WIC contract brands are always covered by your benefits.
alternatives.noAlternativesMessage: We couldn't find alternative formulas for this product at this time.

formulaSighting.noStoresFound: No stores found nearby. Please enable location services.
formulaSighting.impactMessage: Your report helps other families find formula

formulaReport.subtitle: Help others find formula
formulaReport.cameraPermission: Camera permission is needed to scan formula barcodes
formulaReport.unknownProductMessage: This barcode wasn't recognized as a WIC formula.
formulaReport.noStoresNearby: No stores found nearby. Please enable location services.
formulaReport.reportHelps: Your report helps other families find formula.
formulaReport.errorLookup: Failed to look up this product. Please try again.
formulaReport.errorSubmit: Failed to submit your report. Please try again.

formulaAlerts.permissionMessage: To receive formula alerts when your formula becomes available, this app needs permission to send you notifications.
formulaAlerts.alertSetMessage: You'll be notified when {{formula}} becomes available at nearby stores.
formulaAlerts.subscriptionFailed: Failed to set up alert. Please try again.
formulaAlerts.unsubscribeFailed: Failed to cancel alert. Please try again.
formulaAlerts.expirationBody: Your alert for {{formula}} expires in 3 days. Tap to renew.
formulaAlerts.testNotificationBody: You'll receive notifications when your formula becomes available nearby.

formulaAlertsList.title: My Formula Alerts
formulaAlertsList.subtitle: Manage your restock notifications
formulaAlertsList.loadError: Failed to load your alerts. Please try again.
formulaAlertsList.noAlertsMessage: You haven't set up any formula alerts yet. Set an alert to be notified when your formula becomes available.
formulaAlertsList.infoText: Alerts automatically expire after 30 days. Renew before expiration to keep receiving notifications.
formulaAlertsList.renewedMessage: Your alert has been extended for another 30 days.
formulaAlertsList.renewError: Failed to renew alert. Please try again.

foodBanks.title: Food Banks & Pantries
foodBanks.subtitle: Find free food assistance near you
foodBanks.supportMessage: Food banks are here to help. Using these resources is a sign of strength, not weakness. Many families, including WIC participants, benefit from supplemental food assistance.
foodBanks.locationPermissionDenied: Location permission is needed to find food banks near you. Please enable location services.
foodBanks.locationError: Could not get your location. Please try again.
foodBanks.noResultsMessage: Try expanding your search radius or removing some filters.
foodBanks.aboutText: Food banks provide free groceries and meals to anyone in need. Most locations serve all community members, and many specifically welcome WIC participants. If you're struggling to make ends meet, these resources can help supplement your WIC benefits.

privacy.title: Privacy & Data
privacy.subtitle: You control your data
privacy.exportDataDesc: Download all data we have about you
privacy.sharingSummary: We do not sell or share your personal data with third parties. Anonymous, aggregated statistics may be used to improve the app.
privacy.contactMessage: For privacy questions or data requests:
privacy.noDataMessage: You haven't created an account yet, so there's no data to export or delete.
privacy.exportSuccessMessage: Your data has been exported successfully.
privacy.exportError: Failed to export your data. Please try again.
privacy.deleteWarning:
This will permanently delete your account and all associated data including:

• Household & participant information
• Benefit balances and history
• Shopping cart history
• Formula alerts and notifications

Community contributions (product sightings) will be anonymized.
privacy.finalDeleteMessage: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.
privacy.deletedMessage: Your account and all associated data have been permanently deleted.
privacy.deleteError: Failed to delete your account. Please try again.

feedback.title: Send Feedback
feedback.subtitle: Help us improve the app. No account needed.
feedback.question: Question
feedback.placeholderBug: What happened? What did you expect to happen?
feedback.placeholderFeature: What would you like the app to do?
feedback.placeholderQuestion: What would you like to know?
feedback.privacyNote: Your feedback is submitted anonymously. No personal information is collected.
feedback.successText: Your feedback has been submitted. We review every submission and use it to improve the app.
feedback.errorMessage: Could not send your feedback. Please check your internet connection and try again.

locationSettings.defaultBehaviorDesc: How should location be determined when you open the app?
locationSettings.askEachTimeDesc: Choose GPS or zip code each session
locationSettings.whyLocationDesc: WIC-approved products vary by state. Your location helps us show the right product list, find nearby stores, and locate food banks in your area.

complaint.privacyNotice: This tool helps you compose a complaint. Nothing is sent from this app — you contact your WIC office directly.
complaint.contactNote: Contact your state WIC office to file your complaint. You can call, email, or mail the letter above.

wicOffices.aboutText: Your state WIC office can help with questions about eligibility, benefits, complaints, and more. They are here to help you.
